overview: The fans clamored and Jonni answered! Jonni Darkko's P.O.V. Jugg Fuckers 2 offers 14 up close and personal experiences with the most fabulously endowed gals since, well, volume one! Darkko's trademark crisp, tight videography captures these bountiful beauties at their sexiest, dirty-talking and showing off their awesome assets for the camera before settling down to show how each likes to work a cock - with mouth, hands, and of course those huge, soft, fun pillows! Go P.O.V. jug-fucking with McKenzie Lee, Francesca Lee, Sophie Dee, Charley Chase, Kelly Divine and all the rest of these top-heavy temptresses!
title: POV Jugg Fuckers 2
